mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRICE (PRICE_VOUCHER_IDX, PRICE_COMPANY_IDX, BUY_RATIO, BUY_PRISE, SELL_RATIO, SELL_PRISE, PRICE_STATE, PRICE_REG_DTM, PRICE_MOD_DTM) VALUES (#{price_voucher_idx}, #{price_company_idx}, #{buy_ratio}, #{buy_price}, #{sell_ratio}, #{sell_price}, #{price_state}, NOW(), NOW())
